summary: Completed comprehensive testing of WaiterMan POS system. Backend APIs are fully functional (18/18 tests passed). Admin frontend features working perfectly. Customer ordering page has intermittent routing issues but core functionality is implemented.

integration_issues.issue: Intermittent routing issue - /order/:tableId sometimes redirects to admin dashboard

issues: Dialog components missing aria-describedby attributes causing accessibility warnings

passed_tests: Backend API comprehensive testing (18/18 tests passed)
Dashboard stats display and data accuracy
Tables page: Create table, view QR code, delete table
Categories page: Create category and subcategory
Menu page: Create menu item with proper categorization
Order status workflow (pending -> preparing -> ready -> served -> completed)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix customer ordering page routing issue. The /order/:tableId route intermittently redirects to admin dashboard instead of showing customer ordering interface. Route works sometimes but not consistently. Check React Router configuration and CustomerOrder component for potential redirect logic.
